{"id":1239715783,"question_id":777,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1713859777,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1239715783/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"43.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isToeplitzMatrix(int[][] matrix) {\n        \n        int h = matrix.length;\n        int w = matrix[0].length;\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<h; i++){\n            boolean rt = checkDia(matrix, i, 0);\n            if(rt==false) return false;\n        }\n        \n        for(int j=1; j<w; j++){\n            boolean rt = checkDia(matrix, 0, j);\n            if(rt==false) return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private boolean checkDia(int[][] matrix, int i, int j){\n        \n        int h = matrix.length;\n        int w = matrix[0].length;\n        int val = matrix[i][j];\n        for(int r=i+1, c=j+1; r<h&&c<w; r++,c++){\n            if(matrix[r][c]!=val) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
